synopsis.text: News of a captivating OVA release graced the anime world on May 1st, bundled with the limited edition of Kurenai manga's third volume. The OVA, based on Kentaro Katayama's Denpa Teki na Kanojo novels, shares continuity and characters with his Kurenai series. The protagonist, Juuzawa Juu, is a solitary high school student with a delinquent reputation who desires nothing more than solitude. His life takes an unexpected turn when Ochibana Ame, a mysterious girl claiming a past-life connection, approaches him with an offer to serve as his 'knight'. Initially dismissive, Juu's perspective changes when a classmate's tragic murder forces him to seek Ame's assistance in uncovering the truth behind the crime. As they embark on this thrilling and suspenseful journey, the two form an unlikely alliance, proving that sometimes, help comes from the most unexpected sources.
